review_title: Brazilian direction is hell on earth | The rest of the team is amazing
job_title: Anonymous Employee in São Paulo, São Paulo
pros:
It is an organization where you can learn a lot and there is a great opportunity to work on several subjects at the same time. And most importantly, there is motivation for a very beautiful cause.

In Brazil, campaign managers and area coordinators are extremely competent and inspiring professionals who are truly committed to improving the lives of animals. The team is very integrated, fun and friendly.

The compensation and benefits are great for CLT (Brazilian hiring policy).
cons:
Very troubled country director in Brazil. Lack of transparency, tiresome speech and disguised false democracy - if you're emotionally prepared, if that's possible, the amazing team usually help each other in this challenge even beeing everyone affected by the governance abuse.

In general, there's no opportunity for professional growth.
